10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Ishaq As-Sabi'i said:"Sulaiman bin Surad said to Khalid bin Urfutah - or, Khalid said to Sulaiman - 'Did you hear the Messenger of Allah saying: "Whoever is killed by his stomach then he will not be punished in the grave"?' One of them said to the other: "Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الشُّهَدَاءِ مَنْ هُمْ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Who The Martyrs Are
